import React, { useState } from 'react' import NavbarComp from '../Navbar/NavbarComp' import styled from 'styled-components/macro' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { createAxios, getTokenFromLocalStorage } from '../../Hooks/UseAxios' import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker' import 'react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css' const SignupContainer = styled.section` /* border: 1px solid olive; */ max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto; box-sizing: border-box; ` const ErrorBox = styled.div` height: 30px; margin: 1rem 0; /* border: 1px solid red; */ color: red; width: 100%; padding: 2px 0; text-align: center; ` export default function Signup() { const [getDate, setgetDate] = useState(null) const [error, setError] = useState(false) const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState('') const token = getTokenFromLocalStorage() const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ userName: '', userFirstName: '', userLastName: '', userPassword: '', aadharNumber: '', phoneNumber: '', emailId: '', // dateOfBirth: '', gender: '', typeOfAccount: '', }) const navigate = useNavigate() const onChange = (e) => { setError(false) setFormData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [e.target.id]: e.target.value, })) } const submitForm = async () => { const apiUrl = 'http://localhost:8080' const authAxios = createAxios(apiUrl, token) //Format Date to store in MySQL const datee = getDate?.toISOString().slice(0, 19).replace('T', ' ') const formattedDate = datee.slice(0, 10) const data = await authAxios.post('/registerNewUser', { ...formData, dateOfBirth: formattedDate, }) if (data.data === 'User with username Already Existed') { setError(true) setErrorMessage('User with username already exist') } else { window.alert('New user successfully created!') navigate(-1) } } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if ( !formData.userFirstName || !formData.userLastName || !formData.userName || !formData.userPassword || !formData.aadharNumber || !formData.emailId || !formData.phoneNumber || !formData.gender || !formData.typeOfAccount || !getDate ) { setError(true) setErrorMessage('Fields cannot be empty!') } else { setError(false) submitForm() console.log(formData) } } return ( <>
